alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 8:34PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...An area of light rain producing strong wind gusts will impact portions of western Pender and southeastern Bladen Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 832 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of showers capable of producing gusty winds near Rowan, or 16 miles east of Elizabethtown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Rowan, Point Caswell, Long Creek, Murray Town, Montague, Rooks, Malpass Corner, Ashton, Kelly, Rocky Point, Currie, Wards Corner, The Borough, St. Helena, Atkinson, Watha and Pender Memorial Hospital. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 393 and 412. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
